EmailTemplate.subject: IDC: Can your security keep up with the pace of innovation?

${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> IDC on the need for security evolution Add analytics and automation to address new security threats The pace of innovation is increasing as markets embrace cloud, IoT, mobility and analytics technologies. These technologies bring new ways to interact with customers. But they expose your systems to a host of new security threats.
Read IDC’s view on how you can use analytics and automation to complement your perimeter defence, stop breaches quickly, and uncover threats sooner.
